snippet.title: [Release on Nov 9, 2023] Double Dragon Collection Game Trailer
snippet.description:
Official Homepage: https://www.arcsystemworks.jp/dd_collection/

The classic belt-scroller action game series "Double Dragon" all in this one whole package!
"Double Dragon Collection", coming out as a physical multi-app package for Nintendo Switch™!

This package features a collection of 6 Double Dragon games, including "Super Double Dragon", the first official port since its initial release 30 years ago, and "Double Dragon Advance", similarly as the first port in over 20 years!
Other titles included in the package are "DOUBLE DRAGON", "DOUBLE DRAGON II: The Revenge", "DOUBLE DRAGON III: The Sacred Stones" (*All 3 in English version only), as well as the currently-available "DOUBLE DRAGON IV".

■Product Information
[Title name]: Double Dragon Collection
[Genre]: Belt Scrolling Action
[Platform]
  Multi-App Package: Nintendo Switch™
[Release Date]: Nov 9th, 2023 (Thursday)
[Expected retail price]: HKD$
[Copyrights]:  © ARC SYSTEM WORKS　
　　　　　　Double Dragon Advance: ©ATLUS / ARC SYSTEM WORKS
